page.title: 01Introduction to N.E.Norwich
page.content: Our "D" Block begins(south-west corner) approximately half a mile from the centre of Norwich.It includes interesting geographical features,such as Mousehold Heath,Norwich Prison,and large residential areas of both privately-owned and council-owned houses. To the north and east of the region there are large plantations of both deciduous and evergreen trees .These are privately owned.One has been recently leased to Broadland D.C to join the ever-increasing leisure activities available in the area. Approximately 31000 people live in the 'D'Block.There are 11 Primary(or Middle)schools and 2 Secondary schools.At the southern edge of Mousehold Heath you find both Norwich Prison and the Britannia Barracks , formerly home to the East Anglian Regiment and now a military museum.
